about_the_game:
One of set of each SP version card.

[INCLUDED]
- D-SS01/SP01: Chakrabarthi Divine Dragon, Nirvana
- D-SS01/SP02: Blaze Maiden, Reiyu
- D-SS01/SP03: Blaze Maiden, Rino
- D-SS01/SP04: Sunrise Egg
- D-SS01/SP05: Blaze Maiden, Zonne
- D-SS01/SP06: Blaze Maiden, Rona
- D-SS01/SP07: Diabolos, "Violence" Bruce
- D-SS01/SP08: Diabolos, "Anger" Richard
- D-SS01/SP09: Diabolos, "Bad" Steve
- D-SS01/SP10: Diabolos, "Innocent" Matt
- D-SS01/SP11: Diabolos Girls, Maimai
- D-SS01/SP12: Diabolos Girls, Arianna
- D-SS01/SP13: Apex Ruler, Bastion
- D-SS01/SP14: Knight of Heavenly Spear, Rooks
- D-SS01/SP15: Knight of Heavenly Sword, Fort
- D-SS01/SP16: Knight of Heavenly Bow, Base
- D-SS01/SP17: Knight of Heavenly Hammer, Gurgant
- D-SS01/SP18: Healer of Heavenly Staff, Arshes
- D-SS01/SP19: Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia
- D-SS01/SP20: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lattice
- D-SS01/SP21: Sylvan Horned Beast, Charis
- D-SS01/SP22: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lotte
- D-SS01/SP23: Sylvan Horned Beast, Jackalope
- D-SS01/SP24: Sylvan Horned Beast, Zlatorog
- D-SS01/SP25: Aurora Battle Princess, Seraph Snow
- D-SS01/SP26: Aurora Battle Princess, Risatt Pink
- D-SS01/SP27: Aurora Battle Princess, Kyanite Blue
- D-SS01/SP28: Aurora Battle Princess, Ruby Red
- D-SS01/SP29: Aurora Battle Princess, Lourus Yellow
- D-SS01/SP30: Aurora Battle Princess, Treuse Green

**If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive a worthy amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
**This set is also included in the "Rare Card Set 01 - 09".
**It is possible to purchase both individual Rare Card Sets and the bundle, but the acquisition of SP cards will only be reflected once.
**Please be careful not to purchases a Rare Card Sets twice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
